price: 56. Dheh: Waxaa la iga reebay inaan caabudo kuwa aad baridaan (caabuddaan) Alle sokadi.Dheh:Raaci maayo hawadiin- na, waayo (haddii aan sidaas yeelo), waan lumi, kamana mid ahaanayo kuwa hanuunsan.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي نُهِيتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ قُل لَّآ أَتَّبِعُ أَهۡوَآءَكُمۡ قَدۡ ضَلَلۡتُ إِذٗا وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul innī nuhītu an aʿbuda alladhīna tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi qul lā attabiʿu ahwāakum qad ḍalaltu idhan wamā anā mina al-muh'tadīna
